title: The Project Skins
body: so I read the champ description and looked at the weapons, its kind of obvious for luc and leo, zed seems like he would use those blades, and the paragraph about shadows mach. there was the elegant duelist which matches fiora, and that 'scarlet' blade seems like hers, but that last weapon lookies like out of proportion yi blade... is it a new yi skin that's messed up or is it a new champ altogether? you have 5 project skins, will it be 6 or new champ?

replies.body:
Its 100%  {{champion:238}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:89}}{{champion:236}}  maybe {{champion:11}}  and I think the top one is a new champ.

Why do it think its 100% those champions?
Because on the menu system each coloured triangle is connected with a small white triangle, drag your mouse on it and click it then it will give you a short story for each triangle except the top one.
also I just think yi because it looks kind of like his sword, and its also called "Alpha" like his q
> so I read the champ description and looked at the weapons
Leona? I thought that one was Kayle...

> Brilliance in pieces, shrouded in ethereal flame. Protector, light bringer. Lone voice. Stand and Fight. In death heavy fields, now still she stands, light washes over...

kalye is holy, this is describing leo, Light, protector, stand and fight, light washes over and the weapon is easily her shield
nahh its leona because is states one of her quotes 'Stand and fight' and its a bit obvious light bringer

i seriosly hope that is indeed a skin for {{champion:238}} and it looks like a weapon he would use. but it could also be nocturne . but makes more sence if it would be for zed because doesnt nocturne already have a robot skin or something?.
another obvious skin is {{champion:236}}  since he is the only champ that uses dual guns
i was thinking of the shield being for {{champion:201}} but now that you mencion it . it does look like a shield leo would use.
i dont think riot would make a new champ out of this project thing since project is skins so im guessing its a project yi skin.
and well then there is the last one witch i wasnt sure first but now that you mencion fiora i agree. looks like fiora to me.

how does this not mean fiora
> 
> Weaves, unweaves; unraveled defense, dashing forward blade gleaming. Caught orbiting one vision, dashing, striking, blade dancing...

that's legit just describing what she is, and who else can be described in anyway like that? and don't say yi, he is one slice to kill, fiora dances and dashes around, "weaving" around the battle field

Its 100% {{champion:238}} ,{{champion:236}} ,{{champion:89}} ,{{champion:157}} , maybe {{champion:11}} and I think the top one is a new champ.

Why do it think its 100% those champions?
Because on the menu system each coloured triangle is connected with a small white triangle, drag your mouse on it and click it then it will give you a short story for each triangle except the top one.
